title: Homelegance Gavino Metal Platform Bed, Full, Silver
features: Full size metal bed frame comes with 16 slats
Stable and durable metal frame construction with fabric insert on headboard and footboard
Platform bed design can support mattress with or without a foundation/box spring
description: The Gavino Collection is styled for the modern bedroom, utilizing minimalistic design elements to create a unique look. Gray metal framing provides contrast to the brown fabric inserts of the headboard and footboard. The collection is offered in twin (B06XQ4CPVX) and full(B06XQ9KQ8P) size beds.
